issue.title: [C++] Vcpkg install error for abseil on windows when building Arrow C++
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14895](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14895). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I attempted to build arrow c++ by following the [docs](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/developers/cpp/building.html) . However in the vcpkg install command
```java

vcpkg install \
  --x-manifest-root cpp \
  --feature-flags=versions \
  --clean-after-build
```
I get this error - 
```java

Error: abseil:x86-windows@20210324.2 is only supported on '(x64 | arm64) & (linux | osx | windows)'
```
